1: [a]149 Praise ye Jehovah. Sing unto Jehovah a new song, And his praise in the assembly of the saints.
2: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: Let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
3: Let them praise his name in the dance: Let them sing praises unto him with timbrel and harp.
4: For Jehovah taketh pleasure in his people: He will beautify the meek with [b]salvation.
5: Let the saints exult in glory: Let them sing for joy upon their beds.
6: Let the high praises of God be in their [c]mouth, And a two-edged sword in their hand;
7: To execute vengeance upon the nations, And punishments upon the peoples;
8: To bind their kings with chains, And their nobles with fetters of iron;
9: To execute upon them the judgment written: [d]This honor have all his saints. [e]Praise ye Jehovah.
